product_name: Eurolight Decorative Faced 2800 X 2070 X 50Mm Light-Weight Composite Panel
product_description: Eurolight decor is a decorative composite board consisting of melamine-resin-coated thin chipboard.

product_categories.category_name: Furniture and Loose Equipment
Internal Wall Linings, finishes and partition systems
Joinery and benchtop materials and systems
Windows & Doors

recyclable_offcuts_description: No conditions, both the chipboard and the cardboard core can be recycled
recycling_process_description: Honeycomb core can be recycled back into a paper product and particleboard recycled back into particleboard.
water_reduction_techniques: Unsure of %. EGGER use rainwater and cleaning of water from production using bacteria rather than checmicals.
minimisation_design_strategy: design to suit sheets size based on application
modern_slavery_comments: EGGER and ForestOne both have policies. EGGER is a participant of the UN Global Compact, UN 17SDGs and EcoVadis audited.
factory_finished_description: Available in multiple decors option that match the EGGER range.
other_comments:
EGGER is a UN Global Compact participant, UN 17 SDGs, ISS Prime and EcoVadis Audited. 

ForestOne are in the process of going forward with policy and actions to meet the climate risks. All company cars are hybrids, starting with additonal trucks for deliveries changed to hybrids to lower impact.
